1212544: [{"user": "", "rating": 10.0, "title": "", "review": "Every thing was just perfection , from the hotel staff they couldn\u2019t do enough for us , they remembered our names immediately, the rooms clean and beautifully furnished with all mod cons , just totally elegant cannot wait to return."}]
1446475392:
[{"user": "Jean-Claude", "rating": 10.0, "title": "parfait", "review": "Appartement entièrement rénové et très bien équipé. Propreté impeccable. Bien situé à quelques pas de l'Arc de Triomphe. Extrêmement calme. Bonne literie.
Très agréable à vivre,  car l'appartement possède 3 chambres à coucher, 2 salles de bains, ainsi que 2 toilettes, dont un séparé. S'il faut vraiment trouver des défauts, on pourrait dire la pièce du séjour est un peu sombre car la fenêtre donne sur une petite cour intérieure, mais cela est très bien compensé par un très bon éclairage. Il y a aussi quelques petites imperfections dans les finitions.
Check in et check out ont été faits en toute tranquillité on-line. 

L'ensemble est très satisfaisant. Nous y reviendrons sans hésiter lors de notre prochain séjour à Paris.

    "}]
1254648672:
[{"user": "Bilal", "rating": 10.0, "title": "Séjour Magnifique !", "review": "Séjour dans un cadre magnifique , piscine , canette à volonté.

Le cadre est discret  & calme idéal pour couple.
Petit déjeuner offert 5/5.

A refaire avec plaisir."}, {"user": "", "rating": 10.0, "title": "", "review": ""}]
1119297664: [{"user": "Ian", "rating": 10.0, "title": "Love Versailles", "review": " I lovely home with lovely hosts. We had a tremendous day and thoroughly enjoyed our time. "}]
418484: [{"user": "Steven", "rating": 10.0, "title": "Un v\u00e9ritable cocon au c\u0153ur de paris ", "review": "un s\u00e9jour irr\u00e9prochable avec une \u00e9quipe \u00e0 l\u2019\u00e9coute et compr\u00e9hensive qui fait son maximum pour rendre l\u2019exp\u00e9rience client tr\u00e8s satisfaisante. La chambre tres propre et bien d\u00e9cor\u00e9e, un vrai cocon aux c\u0153ur du triangle d\u2019or parisien. l\u2019h\u00f4tel est id\u00e9alement situ\u00e9 ce qui permet de pouvoir profiter pleinement de son s\u00e9jour m\u00eame en p\u00e9riode de couvre feu. je recommande vivement cet \u00e9tablissement!"}]

1471599776: [{"user": "Stephen", "rating": 10.0, "title": "Brilliant apartment In vibrant Paris", "review": "As a family Of 2 adults 2 teenagers we loved this apartment on the first floor. Overlooking the corner fruit market And cafes it felt vibrant and alive to the real Paris. Ideally located near metro or walking distances to station and attractions. Clean and well looked after apartment with everything you need for a stay. Even good quality bedding/towels!\nThe only thing we would add is a brief welcome pack of local information etc and directions for handover process. We left word we would arrive post 7 but the poor agent wasn\u2019t  told and waited ages for us unnecessarily. "}]
1173184864:
[{"user": "", "rating": 10.0, "title": "", "review": "Getting the keys to the apartment was like a paper chase but the instructions were thorough. 
Decor was very good. The kitchen was very well equipped (white goods, cutlery, crockery & utensils). There was an iron & mini-board and a hairdryer, too 
Two front door keys or a key to the courtyard’s street entrance would have been useful for our larger group. The front window’s steel shutters were difficult to close but manageable with perseverance. The stairs into the basement were quite vertiginous and the headroom restrictive but okay with care. We did not find a duvet for the sofa bed it had packed a sleeping bag. Some street noise filtered into the basement but the ground floor bedrooms heard nothing. 
There was an artisanal bakery and a metro-style Carrefour within 4mins walk on Rue du Faubourg Saint-Martin. République Metro station was within a few minutes walk. 
Would it have been possible to store a cycle or scooter in the courtyard?
An enjoyable stay in a beautifully furnished apartment. Thank you, Sebastian, Amina & David!"}]
1655121504: [{"user": "Aissato", "rating": 10.0, "title": "", "review": "Un appartement magnifique tr\u00e8s bien situ\u00e9 j\u2019adore mon s\u00e9jour je recommande vivement "}]
566784: [{"user": "Ian", "rating": 10.0, "title": "", "review": "Jos and her husband Francois are absolutely wonderful. They really make you feel welcome. For my first time in France, they really helped me get acclimated. The locations is right near a transit station, so even though you\u2019re not in the heart you f Paris, you can be in a very short time. Couldn\u2019t be happier with my stay. Would definitely return should I come back to Paris in the future."}]
1025047104: [{"user": "PBUREAU", "rating": 10.0, "title": "", "review": "Wonderful Host, Great Ambiance, Lovely quiet corner of Paris region (7km from Paris center) without the noise and hassle.
